entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
